sql: select a0.receivetime,a0.namespace,a0.pod,a0.container_memory_usage_bytes container_memory_usage_bytes from container_pod_info a0 where a0.receivetime=(select receivetime from container_pod_info where receivetime>now() - interval '2 min' and receivetime<now() order by receivetime desc limit 1) order by a0.receivetime asc,a0.namespace asc,a0.pod asc

select a0.receivetime,a0.namespace,a0.pod,a0.container_memory_usage_bytes container_memory_usage_bytes from container_pod_info a0 where a0.receivetime=(select receivetime from container_pod_info where receivetime>now() - interval '2 min' and receivetime<now() order by receivetime desc limit 1) order by a0.receivetime asc,a0.namespace asc,a0.pod asc

select a0.receivetime,a0.namespace,a0.pod,a0.container_memory_usage_bytes container_memory_usage_bytes from container_pod_info a0 where a0.receivetime=(select receivetime from container_pod_info where receivetime>now() - interval '2 min' and receivetime<now() and namespace='kube-system' order by receivetime desc limit 1) and a0.namespace='kube-system' order by a0.receivetime asc,a0.namespace asc,a0.pod asc

select a0.receivetime,a0.namespace,a0.pod,a0.container_memory_usage_bytes container_memory_usage_bytes from container_pod_info a0 where a0.receivetime=(select receivetime from container_pod_info where receivetime>now() - interval '2 min' and receivetime<now() and namespace!='kube-system' order by receivetime desc limit 1) and a0.namespace!='kube-system' order by a0.receivetime asc,a0.namespace asc,a0.pod asc

select a0.receivetime,a0.namespace,a0.pod,a0.container_memory_usage_bytes container_memory_usage_bytes from container_pod_info a0 where a0.receivetime=(select receivetime from container_pod_info where receivetime>now() - interval '2 min' and receivetime<now() and namespace~'kube.*' order by receivetime desc limit 1) and a0.namespace~'kube.*' order by a0.receivetime asc,a0.namespace asc,a0.pod asc

select a0.receivetime,a0.namespace,a0.pod,a0.container_memory_usage_bytes container_memory_usage_bytes from container_pod_info a0 where a0.receivetime=(select receivetime from container_pod_info where receivetime>now() - interval '2 min' and receivetime<now() and namespace!~'kube.*' order by receivetime desc limit 1) and a0.namespace!~'kube.*' order by a0.receivetime asc,a0.namespace asc,a0.pod asc

select a0.receivetime,a0.namespace,a0.pod,a0.container_memory_usage_bytes container_memory_usage_bytes from container_pod_info a0 where a0.receivetime=(select receivetime from container_pod_info where receivetime>now() - interval '2 min' and receivetime<now() and pod~'python.*' and namespace!='kube-system' order by receivetime desc limit 1) and a0.pod~'python.*' and a0.namespace!='kube-system' order by a0.receivetime asc,a0.namespace asc,a0.pod asc

select a0.receivetime,a0.namespace,a0.pod,a0.container_memory_usage_bytes container_memory_usage_bytes from container_pod_info a0 where a0.receivetime=(select receivetime from container_pod_info where receivetime>now() - interval '1 min' - interval '2 min' and receivetime<now() - interval '1 min' order by receivetime desc limit 1) order by a0.receivetime asc,a0.namespace asc,a0.pod asc

select a0.receivetime,a0.namespace,a0.pod,a0.container_memory_usage_bytes container_memory_usage_bytes from container_pod_info a0 where a0.receivetime=(select receivetime from container_pod_info where receivetime>now() - interval '5 min' - interval '2 min' and receivetime<now() - interval '5 min' order by receivetime desc limit 1) order by a0.receivetime asc,a0.namespace asc,a0.pod asc

select a0.receivetime,a0.namespace,a0.pod,a0.container_memory_usage_bytes container_memory_usage_bytes from container_pod_info a0 where a0.receivetime=(select receivetime from container_pod_info where receivetime>now() - interval '10 min' - interval '2 min' and receivetime<now() - interval '10 min' order by receivetime desc limit 1) order by a0.receivetime asc,a0.namespace asc,a0.pod asc

select a0.receivetime,a0.namespace,a0.pod,a0.container_memory_usage_bytes container_memory_usage_bytes from container_pod_info a0 where a0.receivetime=(select receivetime from container_pod_info where receivetime>now() - interval '10 min 15 second' - interval '2 min' and receivetime<now() - interval '10 min 15 second' order by receivetime desc limit 1) order by a0.receivetime asc,a0.namespace asc,a0.pod asc

select a0.receivetime,a0.namespace,a0.pod,a0.container_memory_usage_bytes container_memory_usage_bytes from container_pod_info a0 where a0.receivetime=(select receivetime from container_pod_info where receivetime>now() - interval '-1 min' - interval '2 min' and receivetime<now() - interval '-1 min' order by receivetime desc limit 1) order by a0.receivetime asc,a0.namespace asc,a0.pod asc

select a0.receivetime,a0.namespace,a0.pod,a0.container_memory_usage_bytes container_memory_usage_bytes from container_pod_info a0 where a0.receivetime=(select receivetime from container_pod_info where receivetime>now() - interval '-5 min' - interval '2 min' and receivetime<now() - interval '-5 min' order by receivetime desc limit 1) order by a0.receivetime asc,a0.namespace asc,a0.pod asc

select a0.receivetime,a0.namespace,a0.pod,a0.container_memory_usage_bytes container_memory_usage_bytes from container_pod_info a0 where a0.receivetime=(select receivetime from container_pod_info where receivetime>now() - interval '-10 min' - interval '2 min' and receivetime<now() - interval '-10 min' order by receivetime desc limit 1) order by a0.receivetime asc,a0.namespace asc,a0.pod asc

select a0.receivetime,a0.namespace,a0.pod,a0.container_memory_usage_bytes container_memory_usage_bytes from container_pod_info a0 where a0.receivetime=(select receivetime from container_pod_info where receivetime>now() - interval '-10 min 15 second' - interval '2 min' and receivetime<now() - interval '-10 min 15 second' order by receivetime desc limit 1) order by a0.receivetime asc,a0.namespace asc,a0.pod asc

select a1.receivetime,sum(a1.container_memory_usage_bytes) container_memory_usage_bytes from (select a0.receivetime,a0.namespace,a0.pod,a0.container_memory_usage_bytes container_memory_usage_bytes from container_pod_info a0 where a0.receivetime=(select receivetime from container_pod_info where receivetime>now() - interval '2 min' and receivetime<now() order by receivetime desc limit 1) order by a0.receivetime asc,a0.namespace asc,a0.pod asc) a1 group by a1.receivetime

select a1.receivetime,avg(a1.container_memory_usage_bytes) container_memory_usage_bytes from (select a0.receivetime,a0.namespace,a0.pod,a0.container_memory_usage_bytes container_memory_usage_bytes from container_pod_info a0 where a0.receivetime=(select receivetime from container_pod_info where receivetime>now() - interval '2 min' and receivetime<now() order by receivetime desc limit 1) order by a0.receivetime asc,a0.namespace asc,a0.pod asc) a1 group by a1.receivetime

select a1.receivetime,max(a1.container_memory_usage_bytes) container_memory_usage_bytes from (select a0.receivetime,a0.namespace,a0.pod,a0.container_memory_usage_bytes container_memory_usage_bytes from container_pod_info a0 where a0.receivetime=(select receivetime from container_pod_info where receivetime>now() - interval '2 min' and receivetime<now() order by receivetime desc limit 1) order by a0.receivetime asc,a0.namespace asc,a0.pod asc) a1 group by a1.receivetime

select a1.receivetime,min(a1.container_memory_usage_bytes) container_memory_usage_bytes from (select a0.receivetime,a0.namespace,a0.pod,a0.container_memory_usage_bytes container_memory_usage_bytes from container_pod_info a0 where a0.receivetime=(select receivetime from container_pod_info where receivetime>now() - interval '2 min' and receivetime<now() order by receivetime desc limit 1) order by a0.receivetime asc,a0.namespace asc,a0.pod asc) a1 group by a1.receivetime

select a0.receivetime,a0.namespace,a0.pod,a0.container_cpu_usage_seconds_total container_cpu_usage_seconds_total from container_pod_cpu_info a0 where a0.receivetime=(select receivetime from container_pod_cpu_info where receivetime>now() - interval '2 min' and receivetime<now() order by receivetime desc limit 1) order by a0.receivetime asc,a0.namespace asc,a0.pod asc

select a0.receivetime,a0.namespace,a0.pod,a0.container_cpu_usage_seconds_total container_cpu_usage_seconds_total from container_pod_cpu_info a0 where a0.receivetime=(select receivetime from container_pod_cpu_info where receivetime>now() - interval '2 min' and receivetime<now() order by receivetime desc limit 1) order by a0.receivetime asc,a0.namespace asc,a0.pod asc

select a0.receivetime,a0.namespace,a0.pod,a0.container_cpu_usage_seconds_total container_cpu_usage_seconds_total from container_pod_cpu_info a0 where a0.receivetime=(select receivetime from container_pod_cpu_info where receivetime>now() - interval '2 min' and receivetime<now() and namespace='kube-system' order by receivetime desc limit 1) and a0.namespace='kube-system' order by a0.receivetime asc,a0.namespace asc,a0.pod asc

select a0.receivetime,a0.namespace,a0.pod,a0.container_cpu_usage_seconds_total container_cpu_usage_seconds_total from container_pod_cpu_info a0 where a0.receivetime=(select receivetime from container_pod_cpu_info where receivetime>now() - interval '2 min' and receivetime<now() order by receivetime desc limit 1) order by a0.receivetime asc,a0.namespace asc,a0.pod asc

select a3.receivetime,a3.cpu,a3.object_id,a2.name,(a2.node_os_info)*(a3.node_softnet_processed_total) node_softnet_processed_total from (select a1.receivetime,a1.cpu,a1.object_id,a1.node_softnet_processed_total node_softnet_processed_total from linux_cpu_info a1 where a1.receivetime=(select receivetime from linux_cpu_info where receivetime>now() - interval '2 min' and receivetime<now() order by receivetime desc limit 1) order by a1.receivetime asc,a1.cpu asc,a1.object_id asc) a3 INNER JOIN (select a0.receivetime,a0.name,a0.pretty_name,a0.object_id,a0.node_os_info node_os_info from linux_os_version_info a0 where a0.receivetime=(select receivetime from linux_os_version_info where receivetime>now() - interval '2 min' and receivetime<now() order by receivetime desc limit 1) order by a0.receivetime asc,a0.name asc,a0.pretty_name asc,a0.object_id asc) a2 on (a2.object_id=a3.object_id and a2.receivetime=a3.receivetime)

select a1.receivetime,a1.cpu,a1.mode,a1.node_cpu_seconds_total from (select a0.receivetime,a0.cpu,a0.mode,a0.node_cpu_seconds_total node_cpu_seconds_total from linux_cpu_mode_info a0 where a0.receivetime=(select receivetime from linux_cpu_mode_info where receivetime>now() - interval '2 min' and receivetime<now() order by receivetime desc limit 1) order by a0.receivetime asc,a0.cpu asc,a0.mode asc) a1 where a1.node_cpu_seconds_total > (10)

select a2.receivetime,a2.mode,(sum(a2.node_cpu_seconds_total))*(100) node_cpu_seconds_total from (select a1.receivetime,a1.cpu,a1.mode,safeDiv(a1.node_cpu_seconds_total-lag(a1.node_cpu_seconds_total) over (partition by a1.cpu,a1.mode order by a1.receivetime),extract(epoch from (a1.receivetime-lag(a1.receivetime) over (partition by a1.cpu,a1.mode order by a1.receivetime)))) node_cpu_seconds_total from (select a0.receivetime,a0.cpu,a0.mode,a0.node_cpu_seconds_total node_cpu_seconds_total from linux_cpu_mode_info a0 where a0.receivetime between now() - interval '5 min' and now() and a0.object_id='6cce615e-8afa-4bde-a648-b4163a0ee957' order by a0.receivetime asc,a0.cpu asc,a0.mode asc) a1) a2 group by a2.receivetime,a2.mode

select a1.receivetime,a1.mode,count(a1.node_cpu_seconds_total) node_cpu_seconds_total from (select a0.receivetime,a0.cpu,a0.mode,a0.node_cpu_seconds_total node_cpu_seconds_total from linux_cpu_mode_info a0 where a0.receivetime=(select receivetime from linux_cpu_mode_info where receivetime>now() - interval '2 min' and receivetime<now() and object_id='6cce615e-8afa-4bde-a648-b4163a0ee957' order by receivetime desc limit 1) and a0.object_id='6cce615e-8afa-4bde-a648-b4163a0ee957' order by a0.receivetime asc,a0.cpu asc,a0.mode asc) a1 group by a1.receivetime,a1.mode

select a1.receivetime,a1.node_cpu_seconds_total total_count,a1.mode,count(1) node_cpu_seconds_total from (select a0.receivetime,a0.cpu,a0.mode,a0.node_cpu_seconds_total node_cpu_seconds_total from linux_cpu_mode_info a0 where a0.receivetime=(select receivetime from linux_cpu_mode_info where receivetime>now() - interval '2 min' and receivetime<now() order by receivetime desc limit 1) order by a0.receivetime asc,a0.cpu asc,a0.mode asc) a1 group by a1.receivetime,a1.node_cpu_seconds_total,a1.mode

select a1.receivetime,a1.cpu,a1.mode,last(a1.node_cpu_seconds_total,a1.receivetime) node_cpu_seconds_total from (select a0.receivetime,a0.cpu,a0.mode,a0.node_cpu_seconds_total node_cpu_seconds_total from linux_cpu_mode_info a0 where a0.receivetime between now() - interval '1 min' and now() order by a0.receivetime asc,a0.cpu asc,a0.mode asc) a1 group by a1.receivetime,a1.cpu,a1.mode

select a5.receivetime,a5.mode,(a5.node_cpu_seconds_total)/(a6.node_cpu_seconds_total) node_cpu_seconds_total from (select a2.receivetime,a2.mode,(sum(a2.node_cpu_seconds_total))*(100) node_cpu_seconds_total from (select a1.receivetime,a1.cpu,a1.mode,safeDiv(a1.node_cpu_seconds_total-lag(a1.node_cpu_seconds_total) over (partition by a1.cpu,a1.mode order by a1.receivetime),extract(epoch from (a1.receivetime-lag(a1.receivetime) over (partition by a1.cpu,a1.mode order by a1.receivetime)))) node_cpu_seconds_total from (select a0.receivetime,a0.cpu,a0.mode,a0.node_cpu_seconds_total node_cpu_seconds_total from linux_cpu_mode_info a0 where a0.receivetime between now() - interval '5 min' and now() and a0.object_id='6cce615e-8afa-4bde-a648-b4163a0ee957' order by a0.receivetime asc,a0.cpu asc,a0.mode asc) a1) a2 group by a2.receivetime,a2.mode) a5 INNER JOIN (select a4.receivetime,a4.mode,count(a4.node_cpu_seconds_total) node_cpu_seconds_total from (select a3.receivetime,a3.cpu,a3.mode,a3.node_cpu_seconds_total node_cpu_seconds_total from linux_cpu_mode_info a3 where a3.receivetime=(select receivetime from linux_cpu_mode_info where receivetime>now() - interval '2 min' and receivetime<now() and object_id='6cce615e-8afa-4bde-a648-b4163a0ee957' order by receivetime desc limit 1) and a3.object_id='6cce615e-8afa-4bde-a648-b4163a0ee957' order by a3.receivetime asc,a3.cpu asc,a3.mode asc) a4 group by a4.receivetime,a4.mode) a6 on (a5.receivetime=a6.receivetime and a5.mode=a6.mode)

select a0.receivetime,a0.namespace,a0.pod,a0.container_cpu_usage_seconds_total container_cpu_usage_seconds_total from container_pod_cpu_info a0 where a0.receivetime=(select receivetime from container_pod_cpu_info where receivetime>now() - interval '1 year 5 min 900 millisecond' - interval '2 min' and receivetime<now() - interval '1 year 5 min 900 millisecond' order by receivetime desc limit 1) order by a0.receivetime asc,a0.namespace asc,a0.pod asc

select a0.receivetime,a0.cpu,a0.mode,a0.node_cpu_seconds_total node_cpu_seconds_total from linux_cpu_mode_info a0 where a0.receivetime=(select receivetime from linux_cpu_mode_info where receivetime>TO_TIMESTAMP(1609746000) - interval '2 min' and receivetime<TO_TIMESTAMP(1609746000) order by receivetime desc limit 1) order by a0.receivetime asc,a0.cpu asc,a0.mode asc

select a1.receivetime,clamp(a1.node_load1,0,10) node_load1 from (select a0.receivetime,a0.node_load1 node_load1 from linux_info a0 where a0.receivetime=(select receivetime from linux_info where receivetime>now() - interval '2 min' and receivetime<now() order by receivetime desc limit 1) order by a0.receivetime asc) a1

select a2.receivetime,a2.cpu,a2.mode,sin(a2.node_cpu_seconds_total) node_cpu_seconds_total from (select a1.receivetime,a1.cpu,a1.mode,safeDiv(a1.node_cpu_seconds_total-lag(a1.node_cpu_seconds_total) over (partition by a1.cpu,a1.mode order by a1.receivetime),extract(epoch from (a1.receivetime-lag(a1.receivetime) over (partition by a1.cpu,a1.mode order by a1.receivetime)))) node_cpu_seconds_total from (select a0.receivetime,a0.cpu,a0.mode,a0.node_cpu_seconds_total node_cpu_seconds_total from linux_cpu_mode_info a0 where a0.receivetime between now() - interval '5 min' and now() order by a0.receivetime asc,a0.cpu asc,a0.mode asc) a1) a2

select a2.device,extract (day from a2.receivetime) receivetime from (select a1.device,a1.receivetime from (select a0.receivetime,a0.device,a0.node_network_up node_network_up from linux_device_info a0 where a0.receivetime=(select receivetime from linux_device_info where receivetime>now() - interval '2 min' and receivetime<now() and device='eth0' order by receivetime desc limit 1) and a0.device='eth0' order by a0.receivetime asc,a0.device asc) a1) a2

select a0.receivetime,a0.namespace,a0.pod,a0.container_cpu_usage_seconds_total container_cpu_usage_seconds_total from container_pod_cpu_info a0 where a0.receivetime=(select receivetime from container_pod_cpu_info where receivetime>now() - interval '5 min' - interval '2 min' and receivetime<now() - interval '5 min' order by receivetime desc limit 1) order by a0.receivetime asc,a0.namespace asc,a0.pod asc

select time_bucket('1 min',a1.receivetime) receivetime,a1.namespace,a1.pod,a1.container_cpu_usage_seconds_total container_cpu_usage_seconds_total from (select a0.receivetime,a0.namespace,a0.pod,a0.container_cpu_usage_seconds_total container_cpu_usage_seconds_total from container_pod_cpu_info a0 where a0.receivetime between now() - interval '5 min' and now() order by a0.receivetime asc,a0.namespace asc,a0.pod asc) a1

select a0.receivetime,a0.namespace,a0.pod,a0.container_cpu_usage_seconds_total container_cpu_usage_seconds_total from container_pod_cpu_info a0 where a0.receivetime between now() - interval '5 min' and now() order by a0.receivetime asc,a0.namespace asc,a0.pod asc

select a0.receivetime,a0.namespace,a0.pod,a0.container_cpu_usage_seconds_total container_cpu_usage_seconds_total from container_pod_cpu_info a0 where a0.receivetime between now() - interval '5 min' and now() order by a0.receivetime asc,a0.namespace asc,a0.pod asc
